And after some days the city of Samosata, near the city of Edessa, was taken.and on that day the Muslim army struck the Roman army and committed great slaughter next to the city gate.And they struck each other at the gate of the city,and the Roman general whose name was Parakoimomenos, a warlike and brave man, went out in battle.and they came to the fortifications of the city called Samosata.Now in the year 407 of this Armenian era the Arab people collected troops in Edessa and all the Edessene land and with a frightful multitude crossed the great river Euphrates.
